verbose_text: In the present study, we examined the hypothesis that the MAPK (including ERK1/2, JNK and p38 MAPK) signaling pathway mediates the GPR91 dependent release of VEGF from retinal ganglion cells (RGCs).
evidence: MAPK (including ERK1/2, JNK and p38 MAPK) signaling pathway mediates the GPR91-dependent release of VEGF
